main.name: ChangYeon (Daniel) Hong
main.description: I have strong Information Technology background and very outgoing personality
main.bio: Hi! My name is Daniel. I'm an enthusiastic Full Stack Engineer seeking a position in an innovative company that desires commitment. Demonstrated research, time management, and problem-solving skills. Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple projects and consistently meet deadlines. A very adaptive quick learner and have great work ethics to ensure efficiency in performing assigned tasks.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

testimonials.text: Working on projects and pair coding with Daniel is always productive and a pleasure. His google-fu skills are impressive and commitment to solving issues tireless.  Any company will find he is a great team player, easy to work with and an accomplished developer. It is obvious he has a passion for development.

I have had the pleasure of working with Daniel for the past six months, collaborating on many projects. Daniel's ability to handle multiple projects is unlike any that I have ever seen before and itâ€™s made a dramatic difference in the productivity level of our team. The value and input that Daniel has given helped motivate our team within our projects and development work, as a team member or leader, Daniel would be an asset to any team
